items.sentence: Tom said he wouldn\'t have gone to Mary\'s party even if she\'d invited him.
I wonder whether or not Tom forgot to tell Mary she was supposed to do that.
We had to fire Tom because he wasn\'t able to do the job we hired him to do.
Since Tom wanted the chocolate much more than she did, Mary let him have it.
The reporters started asking Tom questions as soon as he left the courtroom.
